response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by its users. Given its exceptional quality and features, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $95 for the product. This offer allows us both to benefit: you receive a high-quality item at a reasonable price, while I secure a fair return for my efforts. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 95}
